Amount.description: Amount to apply to or unapply from the payment to the credit.

AppliedDate.description: Date payment was applied. Can be the current date or a provided date.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

HasBeenUnapplied.description: Indicates whether the refund line record with type Applied has been unapplied. Not applicable for a refund line record with type Unapplied.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

PaymentCreditLine PaymentNumber.description: Number of the payment credit line payment. This field is automatically generated.

PaymentId.description: ID of the applied payment credit.

Type.description: Payment credit type. This is a required field.

UnappliedDate.description: Date payment was unapplied. Can be the current date or a provided date.
